title: Bold and the Beautiful star visits Manly kid's hospice | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 135 shares His brunette hair was slicked to the side as he showed off his pearly whites in the snap. Next to him, his new friend from the hospice looked elated at the opportunity to meet the star. Inspired: The 25-year-old wrote a touching tribute in the caption, saying: 'These lovely girls shared some of their incredible stories. Seeing the strength and passion they all carry is so inspiring to me' 'My job is so much fun but this is what makes it worth it,''he wrote in the caption. 'These lovely girls shared some of their incredible stories. Seeing the strength and passion they all carry is so inspiring to me.' 'They truly are the bold & beautiful ones,' he added, before posting the link for support information. Perhaps embodying the inflated self-confidence of his on-screen counterpart, Pierson also made sure he took the time to comment on his own attractiveness in the caption. Hot and he knows it: Perhaps embodying the inflated self-confidence of his on-screen counterpart, Pierson also mentioned in the caption that the girls told him he was 'the most handsome and talented actor in the world' 'They [the girls from the hospice] love the show and think I'm the most handsome and talented actor in the world (they have great taste),' he joked. The show sent more than one hundred crew and cast down under to shoot scenes for the CBS series. According to The Daily Telegraph they brought their own professional-grade coffee machine along to set, seemingly not content with the highly regarded nearby cafes - or the newly opened Starbucks nearby. Oversized: The show sent more than one hundred crew and cast down under to shoot scenes for the CBS series, with one publication reporting that they brought their own coffee machine instead of visiting local cafes The publication also reported that security guards for the show told excited onlookers 'not to look at the set,' in an odd, unsuccessful request. Genetically blessed Pierson previously worked at a model before trying his hand at acting. He took over the role of Thomas Forrester on The Bold and the Beautiful in 2015.
